message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value. To start our discussion, I propose a price of $15000 for the product. This reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the exclusive benefits it offers. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've described, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. What do you think?
